statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-39 \, x^{3} - 17 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x + 9 , 3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - x + 2 , 9 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 1 , -3 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 5 , 2 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
